name: Justin Sullard
description:
Hello, and welcome to my website.

This website, just like myself, is a perpetual work in progress. I intend on keeping it in perpetual beta forever, or will die trying.

Take a look around, bookmark it, check back periodically, drop me a line, let me know what you think.

Anywho, that's enough of my blabbering, get on with your browsing.
